remarks: If ` A ` is an ideal of sets (a nonempty collection closed under subset and binary union) of the set ` D ` of finite bags (the primary applications being ` A = Fin ` and ` A = ~P B ` for some ` B ` ), then the set of all power series whose coefficient functions are supported on an element of ` A ` is a subgroup of the set of all power series. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 16-Jul-2019.)
